text: A large city at night. Klieg lights pierce through the air as a large crowd gathers in front of a large building.

role: Announcer	Tonight, Stellar Productions presents the boy band
text: of the decade! [women scream, jump, and shout. Signs sayins, "FINGERBANG RULES" "FINGER BANG" "WE LOVE FINGER BANG" AND "FINGER BANG 4EVER" bob throughout the audience] It's Fingerbang, live from Madison Square Garden! [the interior is shown, with cheering crowds. A heralding sound effect plays, and spotlights flicker around the stage. A burst of fireworks cues the music and the familiar silhouettes of four boys are shown on stage. A few women faint]

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Yes! Yes! Yes, I'm a star! I'm a star! I'm-  Aaawww, I'm nobody! God-damnit! Wait a minute. Maybe that was a sign from God. That's it, isn't it? You want me to start a boy band so I can make $10 million, don't you? That's it!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Cartman's house, day. Cartman has Stan, Kyle, and Kenny over in the living room.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Gentlemen, thank you for coming. This is the beginning of a great time in our lives.  God has finally spoken to me, you guys. And he has told me how I can make $10 million.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: ...How?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Boy band.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Boy band?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Boy band.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: I'm not being in any  faggy boy band!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: There's nothing faggy about $10 million, asshole! This was a message from God!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Dude, we don't have any musical talent.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: That didn't stop any of the other boy bands, dumbass!  I've got prerecorded music we can sing to, just like they do. All we need to do is practice our choreography over and over and over!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: (That sounds totally fuckin' stupid.)

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Shut up, Kenny. And then, I know I can get us a gig at the South Park Mall. So everybody get in a straight line, we're gonna listen to a song from the top, and take it-!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Wait a minute. There's only four of us.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: So?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: So, all boy bands have five members.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: What?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: *N Sync, Backstreet Boys, New Kids On The Block. All had five members.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: He's right.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Damnit! Okay, okay okayokayokay. We'll put off practice for now, and hold auditions for a fifth member. Get the word out that auditions will be tomorrow morning!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Stan's house, night. The family is gathered for dinner, enjoying ham and turkey

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Did you have fun at Eric's house today, Stanley?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER

text: Well, Cartman wants to start a boy band, so we're gonna rehearse and then try to perform at the South Park Mall.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Oh well, that sounds nice.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: No, it does not sound nice!  Stanley, you are gonna have no part in that boy band!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Well but, Dad, all my friends are doing it.

text: YOU ARE NOT GOING TO BE IN A BOY BAND, STANLEY! AND THAT IS FINAL!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Cartman's house, next morning, early. A rooster crows. Cartman has his band in his room, and they are still drowsy. Stan is about to fall over...

text: ...What?! Who the hell would do that?! Jesus Christ! Grow up Kenny, would you?! Alright, boys, let's do it from the top. 1, 2, 3, 4,-!

text: South Park Mall, day. South Park is not so small anymore. Two guards on the second floor relax against a glass railing

text: Now, I know that this is your first day on the job of mall security, rookie. Keepin' the law in a mall is just like any tough city, and especially because they don't let us have guns. It can be very dangerous.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Oh! Oh-ah, hello Eric.

text: Problem, Chef. I have m-many problems.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Wellll, if you uuhh, come back in just a little bit, Eric, I'll see if I can help you out.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: I just don't know what I'm gonna do. Sometimes I wonder if God isn't toying with me.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Alright, Eric, what's the matter?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Chef, God told me I was to start a boy band and make $10 million. The problem is, it isn't working. I mean,  I feel the music burning inside me. But I just can't express it right, you know?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Well, Eric, I, I think you were just focusin' in on the wrong thing. Boy bands aren't about music, Boy bands are created by corporations to make money. They're all based on the Gomlich effect.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: What's the Gomlich effect.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: The law of physics that states, "If one girl screams for something, it will make other girls scream. And then, it grows exponentiously until all girls within a five-mile radius are screaming."

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: So how do boy bands use that?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: All they do is make videos, showing tons and tons of girls screaming for the boy band. Once you get girls screaming, you can't stop 'em. They're crazih! Uh-uh, except for Lilian, of course.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Thanks!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: You're welcome. Now, go away!  A-and a cucumber in the pants never hurt either!

text: Alright, everybody, listen up! This is how this first shot is gonna work: The girls are standing here, and then the members of the band walk by looking cool. When you see us, you girls all scream like, "Oh my God, it's Fingerbang. Oh my God." Okay?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Dad, I did all my chores. Why can't I play with my friends?

text: Stanley, it's just that there's better things you could be doing on a Saturday than singing and dancing. You could be warching TV or, laying in bed.

text: South Park Mall, late morning. The guards relax on the second floor railings. A stooped man with a clear vessel filled with a green substance walks past them

text: Attention, shoppers: There are naked people at the orange smoothie machine. There are naked people at the orange smoothie machine.

text: The Marsh house, later. Stan sits on the sofa as Randy paces the floor back and forth

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: It's not fair, Dad! Why can't I be in a boy band?!

text: Because I said so!

text: Dad, Cartman said we're gonna perform at the mall at 3 o'clock. My friends are gonna be pissed off at me.

text: NOOO!!  NOOO!!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Dad? What the hell is going on?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: ...I was- ...I was 18 when my high-school men's choir performed at the grand opening of a sporting-goods store.in Denver. I was just one of fifteen members and I had no idea that a record producer was in the audience.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Kid, can I talk to you?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Uh sure.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Heh, you were really great up there. Too good for a pissant choir in a pissant mountain town.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Ohh, thanks.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Listen: I'm putting together a rock group. A vocal group called the Ghetto Avenue Boys. I think you would make a perfect member.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: What? Me? Do you like my singing that much?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Yeah, I think your mustache is perfect. How would you like to come to New York and start a singing career?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Oh my God, I don't know. I mean, I still have another year of high school, and I-

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Hey, look, if you don't want it, I'll keep looking-

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: No! Wait. I mean, ah-I'll think about it.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: I take it that means yes. Call me in the morning.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: And just like that I left everything. I dropped out of high school...

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: See ya.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: ...I said good-bye to my girlfriend...

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: See ya.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: ...And I left my family.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: See ya.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: And suddenly there I was, thrown into a group with four other young men who I didn't even know.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Take 112!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: You've... got... it!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: It's obvious to me.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: The songs were terrible. But believe it or not, the country ate them up. The next thing I knew, we were the biggest thing in the world.

text: Shirl! You've... got... it!

role: It... is what you've got, girl!

text: I had everything. A huge house,  and all the women you can imagine.  And then one day, just as quick as it started...

text: Hey, Mr. Allens

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Heh? Woh. Uh. R-randy.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Who are they

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: These are the Avenue Ghetto Street Boys, my... new boy band.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: But, w-we're still selling records, right?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Look, kid, you're just getting a little... old to be in a boy band.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Get a life, Marsh!  Alright, guys, let's take it from the top.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: They said that after all the money we had made we were in debt to the studio, so they towed my car...

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: See ya.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: ...the women all left...

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: See ya.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: ...and they took back my house

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Ugh.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: See ya.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: The only thing I could do was come back to Colorado, and face everyone that I had abandoned.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Hey! Weren't you the guy in that stupid boy band, the Ghetto Avenue Boys?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Sure, I remember you!  You got it, baby. You got it, baby.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: And so you see, Stanley, I... do know what I'm talking about.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Jesus Christ. ...I never knew.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: I didn't want you to know. Because now I'm a joke. Ever since then, I've wished every single day that I could go back to that moment when I was offered the job and say, "No!" Because all the fame and the money, the womenÂ—all it did was build me up, so that I could be knocked down harder than anybody in the world.  That is what being in a boy band is all about, Stanley.  It's people smothering you and embracing you and loving you and then ssspitting you out and throwing you away like you were last night's pork chops! Now we wander the earth in disarrayÂ—us, New Kids On The Block, the Osmonds... We're all the same. And THAT... is why you can't go to the mall!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: ...Oh-kay.

text: South Park Mall, afternoon. Most of Fingerbang is on the plaza stage, peeking out from behind a curtain with the band's name on it. People begin to gather in front of the stage.

text: Well hurryup. I can't keep the sausage and cheese cart off this spot much longer.

text: Yeah. We'll start right away.  We'll have to do it without him.

text: Hell no! I'm not being part of a four-member boy band! We'll look stupid!

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: The Marsh house, later. Randy is sitting at the foot of his bed, reading from an issue of Teen Heat dedicated to the band. The camera zooms out fron the magazine cover to Randy reading

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Dad?

text: Huh? Yeah?

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Well,... I just wanted to tell you... that I don't think you're a joke. I mean, whatever you used to be, you're just my dad. And you're the best dad I've ever had.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: Come here, Stanley.  Stan, it was wrong of me to try and stop you from joining a boy band without explaining why. I've made some mistakes in my life, and now... I have to let you make your own mistakes.

text: Yeah.

text: We will!  Ladies and gentlemen, we are about to witness the next great boy band of the countrih! Someday you will all be among those who can say, "I saw Fingerbang when they first performed at some crappy little mall."  And so, without further ado, all five members of the...

text: We made two dollars.

text: Move along, ma'am.  Eh, that was pretty good, kids. Maybe you can come perform at my Elks Club sometime.

title: SOMETHING YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR FINGER
text: I don't know if I can handle all this fame. I mean, I always thought I'd wanna become famous, but now that I am, I don't know if I like it. I mean, I probably can't even walk through this mall right now without people goin', "Oh my God, it's the Fingerbang guy! Oh my God!"

text: Well, I think you boys are very smart for your age. Come on. I'll buy you all an orange smoothie.
